whatIsCallForwarding.title: What Is Call Forwarding:
whatIsCallForwarding.description:
Call Forwarding service allows you to seamlessly forward any calls made toward your parked phone over to any US, Canada, or Skype number of your choosing. You keep your old caller ID.
Forwarding can be used with multiple phone lines - you can choose to either receive all the calls on a single telephone, or through a separate telephone for each number.

items.title: Get a toll-free number for your business
items.content: Get a toll free number for your business to create a national presence, or a local number to appeal to your community. You can also keep your current business phone number and connect it to your new account

items.title: Create Your Own Company Greeting
items.content: Record your own personalized greeting that gives your customers the info they need. Or have one of our professionals record it for you

items.title: Route Calls Wherever You Want
items.content: Easily forward calls to your home, office or mobile phone, and include menu options in your greeting to let callers choose the appropriate extension or department

items.title: Do Your Business on the Go
items.content: Use the Mobile App for the fastest and most convenient way to hear voicemails, view text messages, forward calls, and screen unwanted numbers.

items.title: Easily Manage Your Account Online
items.content: Manage your phone system right from your desktop or mobile device. Choose call routing scheduling, voicemail messages and extensions, all in one place.

items.title: Global Call Forwarding
items.content: Incoming calls can be forwarded anywhere, worldwide for the cost of a local call. Display your international numbers on your web site for a global presence.

items.title: Text Messaging
items.content: Send and receive text messages with your Tridacom phone numbers. Not available for toll free numbers.

items.title: Call from Your International Numbers
items.content: You can make calls from your phone numbers, using your phone, from anywhere in the world.

items.title: Voicemail to Email
items.content: Messages are sent your email as an audio file. Listen and download the message. Upload your own custom voicemail greeting or record one over the phone.

items.title: Call Blocking
items.content: Getting unwanted calls? Non-stop telemarketer, robo, fraud or phishing calls blowing up your phone number? Easily add them to your blocked list. Calls will no longer reach you and you'll never hear from them again.
Our infrastructure supports emergency calls. You will be walked through the process when you activate your account.

items.title: Incoming Caller ID Select
items.content: Using your number for business and forwarding to your cell phone? You'll know if that call is coming from your Tridacom number and can answer appropriately

items.title: Outgoing Caller ID
items.content: Place calls showing your caller ID from any number in your account. Display the phone number you select from your account

items.title: Voice Response
items.content: Easy-to-configure voice response and voicemail. Prerecorded messages are available in many languages. Easily record your own messages from any phone.

items.title: Multiple Business Phone Numbers
items.content: Multiple numbers all within a single telephone system. You can set up different call flows and call rules for every number you have enabled and Tridacom will handle calls to each number accordingly.

items.title: A local Phone Number
items.content: One of the easiest ways to connect with the locals - whether you live their or not. It can give your small Business a multi-city feel and your big business a local feel.

items.title: Call Recording & Call Logs
items.content: Review your incoming and outgoing phone calls. Sort by billing period, phone number and/or type of call. You can listen to voicemail messages. Download logs in a .csv file and import into your favorite spreadsheet application.
